property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the FindChangeSatinSetting (a FindChangeTransparencySetting, FindChangeStrokeTransparencySetting, FindChangeFillTransparencySetting or FindChangeContentTransparencySetting).

property.name: applied
property.shortdesc: If true, applies the satin effect. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: effectColor
property.shortdesc: The color applied to the satin effect, specified as a swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink), a color library color, a hex value, or as an array of color values. The color mode dictates the array values: for RGB, specify three values, each in the range 0 to 255, in the format [R,G,B]; for CMYK, specify four values, each as a percentage and each in the range 0 to 100, in the format [C,M,Y,K]; for LAB, specify three values in the format [L,A,B], with L in the range 0 to 100 and A and B in the range -128 to 127; for HSB, specify three colors in the format [H,S,B], with H in the range 0 to 360 and S and B as percentages in the range 0 to 100. Can return: Swatch or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: blendMode
property.shortdesc: The blending mode for the satin effect. Can return: BlendMode enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: opacity
property.shortdesc: The opacity of the satin effect (as a percentage). (Range: 0 to 100). Can return: Real (0 - 100) or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: angle
property.shortdesc: The light angle of the satin effect. (Range: -360 to 360). Can return: Real (-180 - 180) or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: distance
property.shortdesc: The distance (in pixels) from the FindChangeSatinSetting to the satin effect. Can return: Unit (0 - 1000 points) or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: size
property.shortdesc: The width (in pixels) of the satin effect. Can return: Unit (0 - 144 points) or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: invertEffect
property.shortdesc: If true, inverts the satin effect. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the FindChangeSatinSetting.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
